channel.title: [667-700] Please help! How tos

item.title: [667-700] Please help! How tos
item.dc:creator: @Invalidname Invalidname
item.description:
@Invalidname wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:2, topic:439791”]You seem as though you have a pretty decent understanding of basic Java and as such you’re doing fine.

The first two things (text on objects/force chat) can be done by searching for the appropriate method to do those things.

You’re not actually adding text to an object though… You’re adding text to an interface that appears when you click the object. That’s the same idea when you click that book.

Minigames and more complex systems are too detailed to give you any specific advice. You’re going to have to create interfaces that sync with the game (timers/players/etc), add clickable objects/items/npcs, depending on the game. Etc, this will be the bulk of your time as this is real content and will take quite a while to create and then more time to fix the kinks!

Good luck.[/quote]

Alright thanks man

Read full topic

item.title: [667-700] Please help! How tos
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

You seem as though you have a pretty decent understanding of basic Java and as such you’re doing fine.

The first two things (text on objects/force chat) can be done by searching for the appropriate method to do those things.

You’re not actually adding text to an object though… You’re adding text to an interface that appears when you click the object. That’s the same idea when you click that book.

Minigames and more complex systems are too detailed to give you any specific advice. You’re going to have to create interfaces that sync with the game (timers/players/etc), add clickable objects/items/npcs, depending on the game. Etc, this will be the bulk of your time as this is real content and will take quite a while to create and then more time to fix the kinks!

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [667-700] Please help! How tos
item.dc:creator: @Invalidname Invalidname
item.description:
@Invalidname wrote:

[size=12pt]Hey guys, Im currently working on a server named ReFx Nexus-X, and currently i really need help with the following things, (how to do them)[/size]

  • How to add text to objects(as in pk ranks on a scoreboard)

    351dclw.jpg1152×864

  • How to make NPCs say text above their heads( like if i have a npc shop that sells fish, and i want him to say I SELL
    FISH)
    i try this, but it just makes him say things when people click on him:

-How to add minigames(like the Zombie minigame, Stealing Creation, Clan wars,RFD, ect.)

  • How to add text to item books(like if i want to add custom text to the item guide book)

  • How to pk ranks(current code:

[code]// Decompiled by Jad v1.5.8g. Copyright 2001 Pavel Kouznetsov.
// Jad home page: http://www.kpdus.com/jad.html
// Decompiler options: packimports(3)
// Source File Name: PkRank.java

package com.rs.utils;

import com.rs.game.player.Player;
import java.io.*;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Comparator;

// Referenced classes of package com.rs.utils:
// SerializableFilesManager, Utils

public final class PkRank
implements Serializable
{

public PkRank(Player player)
{
    username = player.getUsername();
    kills = player.getKillCount();
    deaths = player.getDeathCount();
}

public static void init()
{
    File file = new File("data/pkRanks.ser");
    if(file.exists())
        try
        {
            ranks = (PkRank[])SerializableFilesManager.loadSerializedFile(file);
            return;
        }
        catch(ClassNotFoundException e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        catch(IOException e)
        {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    ranks = new PkRank[300];
}

public static final void save()
{
    try
    {
        SerializableFilesManager.storeSerializableClass(ranks, new File("data/pkRanks.ser"));
    }
    catch(IOException e)
    {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

public static void showRanks(Player player)
{
    for(int i = 0; i < 316; i++)
        player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i, "");

    for(int i = 0; i < ranks.length; i++)
    {
        if(ranks[i] == null)
            break;
        String text;
        if(i >= 0 && i <= 2)
            text = "<img=1><col=ff9900>";
        else
        if(i <= 9)
            text = "<img=0><col=ff0000>";
        else
        if(i <= 50)
            text = "<col=38610B>";
        else
            text = "<col=000000>";
        player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, i + 16, (new StringBuilder(String.valueOf(text))).append("Top ").append(i + 1).append(" - ").append(Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(ranks[i].username)).append(" - kills: ").append(ranks[i].kills).append(" - deaths: ").append(ranks[i].deaths).toString());
    }

    player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(275, 2, "Player Killing Ranks Table");
    player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(275);
}

public static void sort()
{
    Arrays.sort(ranks, new Comparator<Object>() {

        public int compare(PkRank arg0, PkRank arg1)
        {
            if(arg0 == null)
                return 1;
            if(arg1 == null)
                return -1;
            if(arg0.kills < arg1.kills)
                return 1;
            return arg0.kills <= arg1.kills ? 0 : -1;
        }

        public int compare(Object obj, Object obj1)
        {
            return compare((PkRank)obj, (PkRank)obj1);
        }

    }

);
}

public static void checkRank(Player player)
{
    int kills = player.getKillCount();
    for(int i = 0; i < ranks.length; i++)
    {
        PkRank rank = ranks[i];
        if(rank == null)
            break;
        if(rank.username.equalsIgnoreCase(player.getUsername()))
        {
            ranks[i] = new PkRank(player);
            sort();
            return;
        }
    }

    for(int i = 0; i < ranks.length; i++)
    {
        PkRank rank = ranks[i];
        if(rank == null)
        {
            ranks[i] = new PkRank(player);
            sort();
            return;
        }
    }

    for(int i = 0; i < ranks.length; i++)
        if(ranks[i].kills < kills)
        {
            ranks[i] = new PkRank(player);
            sort();
            return;
        }

}

private static final long serialVersionUID = 0x4afd04fe5f6b90fdL;
private String username;
private int kills;
private int deaths;
private static PkRank ranks[];
@SuppressWarnings("unused")
private static final String PATH = "data/pkRanks.ser";

}
[/code]

last but not least how to make the GRAND EXCHANGE WORK!! i have it made and set in the correct place also, with the npcs and every thing there but i cant get it to work! ><

dpbtk4.jpg1152×864

I know it seems like alot and it is, but once i figure out how to do all that i can release my server.

also i have this error when i start up my server, even though it works perfectly i just want to know if i can fix it or not.

[code]java.lang.Error: Unresolved compilation problems:

Misc cannot be resolved

Misc cannot be resolved
Misc cannot be resolved
Misc cannot be resolved
Misc cannot be resolved
Misc cannot be resolved

    at com.rs.game.npc.combat.impl.AsteaFrostwebCombat.<init>(AsteaFrostwebC

ombat.java:15)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)

    at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)

    at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou

rce)
at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Class.newInstance0(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Class.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at com.rs.game.npc.combat.CombatScriptsHandler.init(CombatScriptsHandler
.java:26)
at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:111)[/code]

anyway if you could help me thank you so much! at least give me some advice anyway thanks guys!
